title: Can somebody actually tell me how is this meta called?
body:
I mean, we had mage meta, tank meta, adc meta, support meta and assassin meta. What is this meta that we have now? In S8 nobody was even discussing that. I don't actually know what this meta is. Here are things that may suit:

*Tankless meta? xd

*High damage meta? 

*Dark Harvest meta? 

*Turrets are sacks of gold meta? xd

*Bounty meta?

But seriously, can smb tell me how is this meta called?

replies.body: League of champions who keep not getting nerfed for some reason meta.
Kinda soon to tell, but aside from the obvious dark harvest op meta, it seems to be snowball and don't throw it meta.
eh, i call it, 1v9 or 2v8 meta
Me and my lol playing friends call it the damage meta. Anything that doesn't deal a lot of damage or facilitate a lot of damage is garbage.
with how good early game champs are rn and the absurd gold income id say itd be called the snowball meta
People will probably say either high damage or dark harvest meta.

Dark harvest meta.

Becoming as notorious, if not more than thunderlords meta.

I dunno...is it meta? 

Aha ha ha ha....ha...ah....ow
